product_name: Hydrapak SoftFlask 500 Outdoor Collapsible Bottle - 16.9 fl. oz.
long_description: The 16.9 fl. oz. Hydrapak SoftFlask 500 Outdoor Collapsible Bottle makes keeping hydrated simple. It's got a large filling port, a handy shut-off valve and a design that stores easily in your pocket. Innovative collapsible bottle is perfect for any on-the-go activity; store it in a jacket pocket or backpack pocket, or just carry it in your hand with the soft finger loop. Hydrapak SoftFlask 500 Outdoor Collapsible Bottle features a bite valve for no-drip use when you're on the move.
short_description: The 16.9 fl. oz. Hydrapak SoftFlask 500 Outdoor Collapsible Bottle makes keeping hydrated simple. It's got a large filling port, a handy shut-off valve and a design that stores easily in your pocket.
